titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Sir Paul Dukes papers
titlestmt.author: Processed by David Jacobs

publicationstmt.p: Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid derived from Microsoft Word and MARC record by David Jacobs. Date of source: 2009
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Diaries, writings, lectures, notes, letters, clippings, memorabilia, and photographs relating to British intelligence operations, especially during the Russian Revolution, to popularization of Yoga in the Western world, and to personal affairs. Includes fictional writings, poems and musical compositions. Also includes some material relating to Sir Paul Dukes collected by Robin Bruce Lockhart.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Sir Paul Dukes papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1989.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Sir Robert Hamilton Bruce Lockhart papers, Hoover Institution Archives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Diaries, writings, lectures, notes, letters, clippings, memorabilia, and photographs relating to British intelligence operations, especially during the Russian Revolution, to popularization of Yoga in the Western world, and to personal affairs. Includes fictional writings, poems and musical compositions. Also includes some material relating to Sir Paul Dukes collected by Robin Bruce Lockhart.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Espionage, British--Soviet Union.
Secret service--Great Britain.
Yoga.

did.unittitle: Personal profile complied by Robin Bruce Lockhart

scopecontent.p: Includes award certificates; biographical note; correspondence; notes; and photographic prints and negatives.
Includes correspondence with the Dalai Lama and Pandit Nehru; genealogical essay on the Dukes family; maps; passports; and photographic prints.
Includes articles by Paul Dukes; certificate of registration; correspondence; list of contents; marriage certificate; notes; proposals; and writing fragments.

did.unittitle: Clippings, official documents issued by Soviet authorities, and photographic prints

scopecontent.p: Includes clipping, card, poem, scores, scripts, and sheet music.

did.unittitle: Clippings, largely relating to the espionage activities of Paul Dukes
"Sai Baba," manuscript by Paul Dukes relating to his travels in India
Published articles by Paul Dukes on the practice of yoga
Lectures and other writings by Paul Dukes, largely relating to the practice of yoga
Clippings, largely relating to the teaching of yoga by Paul Dukes and Diana Fitzgerald
Photographic prints, largely depicting Paul Dukes and Diana Fitzgerald engaged in yoga activities
Album of photographs depicting scenes in India, including some portraying Paul Dukes

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes notes and list of contents compiled by Robin Bruce Lockhart, 1990.
